title: Montreal Botanical Garden
description: One of the city’s most beautiful natural places, filled with themed gardens and peaceful walking paths.

title: Chinatown Montreal
description: A lively neighborhood full of colors, markets, traditional food and cultural energy.

title: Notre Dame Basilica
description: A spectacular Gothic Revival church known for its stunning interior and historic importance.

title: Old Town
description: A historic district with cobblestone streets, charming cafes, waterfront scenery and European architecture.

title: Place des Arts
description: Montreal’s major cultural center, hosting concerts, festivals, exhibitions and performances.
